storyInfo: Having arrived at the black market, Kal'tsit has begun preparing for her journey with Old Isin's assistance. On the other hand, Elliot is hesitating. He must cut loose his past, and he chooses to remain in Sargon.

attributes.content: Modern Day
4:14 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, Warzone
I find myself looking back on those events often, during my most difficult times.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Whenever I grow tired of striking the iron, whenever I am unsatisfied with inferior materials that result in products less than satisfactory—The events I witnessed that day immediately come to mind.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: —So you took care of all those mercenaries by yourself—?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: No, he planted those weapons beforehand... and they self-destructed.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I'm surprised you could bring yourself to actually do it... Didn't you make all those things yourself...?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: What kind of craftsman has lingering affection for their creations? The reason we pour our emotions into our work is to create an even more refined product, not to be tied down by our feelings.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: So you had it all figured out beforehand, eh?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I eliminated all the factors unbeneficial to us. What is wrong about that?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: —Ugh, this burnt smell stinks...
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Don't tell me Rhodes Island claims to be pacifist.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Though I can certainly tell you two are not.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: So... what did you see that day again...?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Ah, has either of you personally seen her in combat?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: It is as though she had a birds-eye view from up in the sky. Everything was under her control.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: We're close. Very close.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Sarkaz... Devils... She won. She won indeed. Old Isin knew this is exactly how it would turn out...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Ahem, do you have to follow me around?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Of course, Lady Kal'tsit asked Old Isin to. Until the moment she steps out of Sargon, her wish is Old Isin's command.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Hmm, is that her over there...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.text: On the other side of the hills, the smell of Originium gunpowder and blood yet lingers in the sandstorm, a phenomenon that has become all but natural to Elliot.
A gust of wind blows past, carrying away with it the dust. Under the clear sun, the strange creature's large stature appears as though it is distorting even the sunlight.
She is as calm and quiet as one can be.

attributes.content: *Cough*—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You could've become a warrior, nameless mercenary. A Sarkaz Warrior.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My death... is for a greater purpose, Caster.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Not going to finish me?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Let's see—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Angry low roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Tsk... This monster... I'm more than ready to die. Are a few extra scratches that much to ask for?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Roars)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Enough, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He's a dead man with those injuries.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dissatisfied hisses)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Hah... Looks like we saved the padishah some trouble...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sarkaz... What's your name...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Pfft... Which one?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Tell me, Caster. The Kazdel you were talking about... How does it look now?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Terrible still.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the Sarkaz are rebuilding their homes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Home...? How could us devils... us Infected possibly have one...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I've never left Sargon...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have tried to rebuild 'Kazdel', their home for centuries, though they have never succeeded.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Everyone has a different idea as to what the term 'homeland' means, but as it stands right now, Kazdel is perhaps as close as you can get to the term's original meaning.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The 'Teekaz' deserve a home.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tsk... That does...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...have a nice ring to it...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Poor devil, poor devil. He is gone, no longer with us.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You two shouldn't have come.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You made quite a ruckus here. Old Isin thinks this place could use some cleaning to avoid catching anyone's attention...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You took all of them down by yourself...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Shakes head in dissatisfaction)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Um, okay. You two... took down a whole mercenary squad? How many of them were there?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: It was no easy task. I would've been in quite a tight spot if they weren't as afraid of Mon3tr as they were.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's pick up the pace. We've already found ourselves in seven skirmishes since we left Redhorn.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And now we have an entire Sarkaz mercenary squad. We'll likely face the lord ameer's guards next or the padishah's elite troops. No matter the case, the more we run, the more fierce our enemies become.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin gets the impression that you didn't want to kill them?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You're not wrong.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You seem to have special feelings for Sarkaz... Oh, pardon Old Isin. Old Isin should not have asked.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The sun is setting soon, Lady Kal'tsit. We must bury these bodies right away. It looks like their sand buggy will save us quite a bit...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: We need to be quick.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: Can knowledge be a means to buy over a person's heart? Elliot has never so much as thought about that. He used to be naive, but he was also gifted precisely because of this. Of course, he cannot understand why Old Isin would follow everything Kal'tsit says after that exchange of theirs.
It is as though he lives in the distant past. He merely gazes at the far end of Sargon's golden sands, waiting for someone to come give him the answer he has always sought.
Is knowing what the answer is all that he ever wanted?

attributes.content: This... is the entrance to the old market. This is the Reefsteep Town.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yet another Sargon town...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Old Isin knows where the entrance is... The old market is no secret. Anyone has the right to look for that which they want here.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Come with Old Isin.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin...? I thought you died in the golden sands!
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Old Isin is fortunate to survive.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Hm, are those two behind you Columbians...? Columbians on the run. That box they have gotta be worth some money, then.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Oh, relax. Why so tense? I'll give you 400 gold coins for that box.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Sorry, but it's not for sale.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, that's too bad...
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: No worries, I'm sure we'll have more chances to do business with each other. Isn't that right, Old Isin? Haha.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Please don't let it get to you, Lady. This happens often here.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: She isn't actually that curious about the box...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: If she actually had her mind set on it, we well wouldn't be getting much sleep in the future.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She opened at 400 coins...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: This is the Reefsteep Black Market. The vibrant heart of Ibut.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: How long are we staying here...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: This will be a long journey. It will take Old Isin time to prepare. Perhaps two weeks.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Isin, I'm counting on you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mm, what is this for...? Gold coins? Old Isin needs no money at all...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Our enemies are still coming after us. We need to get the preparations done as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin understands, but please keep your coins. Old Isin is in no place to take them... and Old Isin still has much to ask you.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Very well, I understand... Feel free to ask me any time. Even now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you... Old Isin is far too old... Old Isin has forgotten far too many important things.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Alas, most of those who remembers what I wish to know have come and gone. That is why Old Isin is looking for clues...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Lady, you are young. Normally, Old Isin would not hold out hope for those your age... but you know of that city, the secrets that disappeared in those great winds long ago.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: What do you want to remember, old Savra?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin once served a padishah... The Padishah of the Land of Reefsteep. The padishah saw Old Isin as a friend and would even die for Old Isin. An honor Old Isin can never fully repay...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yet... it has been far too long. Old Isin has forgotten the words of the padishah. Before Old Isin dies, Old Isin must remember his words.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The disaster that destroyed the city left you directionless.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It has been too long, Lady. Look, you remember even that Catastrophe—
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The padishah who ruled Reefsteep doesn't show up in the history books much, but, at the very least, the written accounts and folklores do not mention a Savra fortune teller.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It will probably take some time if you want to figure out who you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, that's fine—Even if you must leave this place behind and there is still a long wait ahead, Old Isin will patiently await your return.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin dares not to die. Old Isin only asks you to remember this.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: I promise you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please, come with Old Isin. Old Isin has a home here. An old dwelling...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Umm...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Isn't this just a normal—Wait, what's this?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Pure gold—?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You buried a whole mountain of pure gold here?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: These are Old Isin's riches... but Old Isin had no way to spend them. Now, Old Isin is glad to finally give them purpose.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: That's no small sum you have. Has no one gone after your riches before?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin was the padishah's favorite courtier. Even if Old Isin had not a bean to his name, Old Isin will always be protected.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin will get started with the preparations now.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: What do you want to know?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Far too much, my lady...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: But you possess all the answers.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: It feels pretty empty up here...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: A black market always starts out as a normal underground bazaar. It's a fairly common sight for areas barraged by Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When nightfall comes, the lights are moved underground.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Something on your mind?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've been on the run with you for a while now, but you're still keeping me in the dark for a lot things. Like that old Savra with amnesia.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Long ago... there used to be a city here. The only nomadic city in Ibut's vast territory.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The building of a city is a miracle in itself, but, before the Reefsteep Padishah, no one had managed to unite all of Ibut. And the symbol of that unity? That city among the golden sands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That was what inspired everyone to unite under his rule. That era was not that long ago, and I believe there are still a fair amount of people out there wallowing in their homeland's former glory.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Unfortunately, it was not meant to last. The city met its fate during a Catastrophe. Supposedly, after the padishah had evacuated all his citizens and workers, he simply lamented and lashed out at the gathering storm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lash out... at the Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: That's how it was recorded in history, at least, but it most likely actually happened.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Catastrophe laid waste on the padishah's grand achievement in a brief moment. In just one night, all its citizens became refugees. They very well could have built a new home together, but with the destruction of the city... everything was left behind in that sandstorm, forgotten.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin was among them. The lords ameer and the new padishah didn't want to spend a huge sum of money to rebuild the city. Thanks to that, their descendants likely had no idea where to begin to rebuild their homeland.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This filled them with grief, and this is also why they give all those who still respect the 'Land of Reefsteep' the same amount of respect.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So... Is that why they're helping us...? Because it's like helping out their countrymen?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: From the looks of it, we'll get to leave Sargon soon, right?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If everything goes well, we should be leaving Sargon territory within the month.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And we're going to Ursus?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I don't get it. Did you really abandon everything you had in Columbia and came to Sargon just to keep our research from becoming the powder keg that sparks a war?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: None of you could've possibly foreseen what the chain of events would eventually lead to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And you can...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If you really want me to give you an answer, I'll say yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It would be so much easier for you if you killed me and destroyed the box now... but, here you are, letting me hold onto it.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Do you want me to do that?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: At first... I was really bothered that I was the only survivor, but I don't feel that way anymore.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... If I give you this box now, will you do something for me... for us?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You know the Ibuti Lord Ameer was dragged into this mess. From Sargon to Columbia, the accomplices of this conspiracy are everywhere.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I still want them to pay the price...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: See, this box—It's my one and only trump card.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: But once it's destroyed, you'll have nothing—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Nothing?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Actually... Kal'tsit, ever since the beginning, I've always felt I didn't need this box.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I remember all the details, and I can replicate our past results.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, it'll take a long time, and there's probably going to be lots of difficult issues... but I think I can do it.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If, just like you said, there's some kind of way to turn this Originium energy source into a weapon—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: This is the first time you are looking me in the eyes, Kal'tsit. The first time you aren't treating me as a kid or someone to be protected, but as a scientist, a Columbian.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Perhaps I've been underestimating you because of your age, Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Relax, I won't let these bad guys use the Professor's research as they please. I won't.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: But I will use it to finish one last thing.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You don't understand how Professor Thorne's research came to be.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I heard him say before that the basis of the technology came from a set of ancient ruins that archaeologists found in Sarkaz, and it could provide nomadic cities an entirely new and convenient energy source—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: —I'll say it again. If misused, this could easily bury half of Sargon under its golden sands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Well, you were the head of the mercenaries to begin with. You probably have a few other tricks up your sleeve just to be safe, don't you, 'Adviser?'
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Such as... taking me out right now. The way you people like to take care of things.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Happy sounds)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Go back inside...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Enough with the tough act, Elliot. With the way you are now, you can't make a sensible decision.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You should really think about what it is that you want to do carefully.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you. This is all that Old Isin wants.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You're going so far away?
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Old Isin won't be going... Old Isin will go nowhere.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Alright, your call. You got the cash, and I got the goods. It's as simple as that.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: You need any help packing?
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: No, no need. We must keep my lady's whereabouts a secret...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Isin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, my lady. The preparations are almost complete. We have medicine, food, water, and a small amount of refined Originium Ingots.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: This car here's stolen, and it's already been modified about four or five times by the Vouivre.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: It's kinda beat up, but that's the only downside to it. It's got everything you want in a car, even got a Multi-Grenade Launcher.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: I heard you guys are going north? Where to? Sami, perhaps? Whoa, will you guys actually make it that far?
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: As for your compensation...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: All pure gold? I ain't giving change, you know. That's a pain in the butt.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Just like how we were treated in the old days, Old Isin is never stingy when it comes to compensation.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Heh. Well, thanks!
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: Let's call it a day here, Isin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Very well, my lady... If all goes well, you will be departing on your journey within the next three days.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: —Leithanian Arts Units' parts are nice and all, but they're such a hassle to use, and they are usually pretty rough. The Columbians make much better stuff.
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: I got some new wares here... Originium weapons straight from Minos. They...
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: —Once you place the order, you gotta buy it. What about it don't you understand—
attributes.name: Black Market Resident

attributes.content: How lively... Old Isin doesn't hate this place at all.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: If you have wealth and status here, why roam the streets elsewhere in Ibut?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin wants to help Sargonians. This ideal helped Old Isin move forward and helped support his many lifetimes.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Compared to the average lifespan of a Savra, you have lived quite a long time. Is this an effect of your Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin... has forgotten even what his Originium Arts could do... Old Isin can fiddle with this Originium crystal ball, but Old Isin does not remember what kind of tricks it conjured up back in those grand, radiant days.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: This isn't a normal physiological disease. Your brain and body are under the influence of some kind of Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lady Kal'tsit... Old Isin thinks that, with the Reefsteep lost to the storm, perhaps there are no more clues to be found anywhere but in the centermost areas of Sargon...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Have you been to that fabled golden city?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You mean the capital of Sargon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Though its industrial prowess has been advancing day by day, Sargon's capital has never once opted to relocate its nomadic city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the winds, the sands ceaselessly beat against Sargon's walls as time goes on and on...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Even Catastrophes cannot rock Sargon's core.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin thinks what he has forgotten is there. Old Isin can remember everything there... but that is a place that Old Isin can never reach...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Only the padishahs and a few lords ameer who were granted the royal privilege may see that city hidden deep within the sandstorms.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You said you wanted an answer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin remembers nothing but a dream... In the dream, amid those boundless hotlands, the armies simply charged toward the horizon devoid of people...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: All Old Isin remembers of it is that the Iron Heels hoisted a scarlet web and charged toward the southernmost horizons of Sargon.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: But this has nothing to do with the Reefsteep. Is this perhaps a key that could lead to Old Isin's past?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Hang on a second. Could you—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You could not have known that... The conquest of the Kheshigs of Nightzmora took place over a thousand years ago... How does this have anything to do with Reefsteep?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kheshigs... The Nightzmora's royal debt... Old Isin knows. Old Isin knows... but why?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Did you serve a Nightzmoran offspring?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The king of Sargon created a Kuranta of Nightzmoran blood padishah?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin... seems to...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Padishah... Reefsteep Padishah... Old Isin's master a Kuranta? A descendant of Nightzmora?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The two of you made for the Watchman's walls together, and he must have recounted to you the exploits of his bloodline... something that he must've taken pride in.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Walls, yes, but no mere city walls. It was to the south. Yes, the south! Atop the hotlands that not even Sargonians would set foot on, there stood the entrance to lands yet undiscovered by man—
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Nightzmora... A Nightzmoran was created padishah, and the Ibut region was once the center of his political exploits.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He didn't choose to merely wallow in the luxuries promised to him by the lords ameer. Instead, his thirst for conquest drove him to...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...to conquer these deserts, yes... The padishah wanted to conquer these golden sands. He led the people, and built an entirely new city... A nomadic city...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: According to the history books, he almost succeeded.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for you, even though he treated you with nothing but benevolence, even though he passed away long ago... you remain lost in his life.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin remembers now...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin is not a gatekeeper... and certainly not the padishah's close friend... Old Isin was... just a jester before them...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: No... Old Isin remembers now... No, no, no... Was it those summer nights?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: *Cough*—
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Please, calm down a little.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right... Age has left Old Isin's memories in a muddle... You are right... Once upon a time, the padishah would hold a banquet at his palace every starry night and address all those in attendance.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: No... No... *Whimpers*... Old Isin... was undeserving to bask in his glory and radiance... *Whimpers*...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You've been under his Originium Arts' influence, and the long nightmare has twisted your thinking... Though this is not something he had done to you deliberately.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His subjects went voluntarily. There was none who could resist those extraordinary fantasies, curiosity, longing, and thirst for knowledge. All of it worked to keep us enthralled by the padishah's charm.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You were lost in your own dreams.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No... It shouldn't be... Old Isin shouldn't...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Please... Allow Old Isin a brief moment of peace... Please... leave Old Isin alone...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: We're leaving tomorrow.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What about Old Isin...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: He needs some time to clear up his thoughts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Nightzmora had been tormenting him for way too long. He's been trying to embrace the past in his dreams.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't get it...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: We have no use for the box anymore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was our final trump card, but now that we are leaving Sargon behind us, it makes no difference to us anymore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is mine...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The last thing I still have.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: That's why I'm leaving the decision to you...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What will you do?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're forcing me to make a decision...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm not forcing you to do anything. Even if you are actually able to replicate technology behind it and break away from its original... form, with where the Originium industries are currently, that will do you no good at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tsk...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The young researcher sets the box down after hesitating briefly.
He has almost completely forgotten what is inside the box despite the fact he has kept it on his person for the entire journey.
This...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The blue Originium crystals are discharging tiny, stable sparks.
It's beautiful...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Is this... really as dangerous as you've been making it out to be?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: A simple sample such as this won't help explain why. Once you master the core principles behind it, you will be able to craft from it a grenade capable of wiping out an entire city with ease.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What do you think will happen if the Ibuti Lord Ameer or Padishah Murad got their hands on this technology?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The technology is still being developed. The bad guys will get their hands on it sooner or later.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The truth is... this Originium crystal sample is the only one of its kind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As an Originium crystal, it actually isn't particularly special on its own. It is how it came to take its current form that makes it special. It was found in an excavation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can always count on the archaeologists to discover new secrets...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The Columbians only ever found three Originium samples like this one. Without exception... they all came from the surroundings of a certain Sarkaz ruin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What's going to happen if you destroy them?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The sample's explosive range is hardly comparable to the electrical devices we use in experiments. However, because of its nature, it will nonetheless put us in danger—the danger of being infected with Oripathy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, alright.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You said it's one of a kind? Well, then. I know how to take care of it now.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: —Wait!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can't—Mon3tr, protect him!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dissatisfied shrieks)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: The boy smashed the beautiful crystal to pieces.
In an instant, the bright light of the electric sparks has engulfed everything in the immediate area.
Agh—Why... are you stopping me...?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Didn't you hear me...? This is a piece of Originium!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You will get infected!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gah... hah...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: So what?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Do you hate the Infected? Do you despise them? Hah.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Well, perfect! I don't owe you anything anymore now—!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm Infected myself...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh—Wha—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Ugh... Argh...! It hurts...! My head...!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Those are the symptoms of an acute infection. We need to get you treated right away.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't—Argh—need it—!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm just keeping you from turning to Originium dust within the next few hours.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You chose the wrong path, Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if you were trying to shatter your own fate, this is the worst possible method you could choose.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ugh... Uhh... Eugh!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Elliot Glover...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are now an Infected. This is the fate you chose for yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Aghh... Hahh...!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Well, this is just the perfect fate for me, then...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If you don't want to live a life of suffering, I have many ways to set you on your way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No... I just... guh.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Perhaps this... will help me... break away from these shackles... Now I have nothing... to do with my past...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Sorry... for dragging you into this mess...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm surprised you can still apologize.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's because I hate you too, Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I thought you weren't going to treat me like a Columbian anymore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No... That's not why...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Do you really think you can decide somebody else's fate for them...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I've never once thought I could.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But that is exactly what you are doing, Kal'tsit... even though no one could say you made the wrong decision doing that...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: *Sigh*... but it's all coming to an end now, isn't it?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Ugh, ha...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: This doesn't change when I will be leaving, and you need to lay down and get some rest right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So is this what Oripathy is...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: It differs from person to person.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So does that mean... I don't need to use those Arts Units to conduct Arts Device experiments now?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You haven't received any in-depth Originium Arts education, and it will just kill you even sooner.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So you are saying I can do it.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Yeah... That's not so bad.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Keep going straight, and you will reach another way out of the black market.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Only Old Isin knows of this exit. No one has even been here.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: An altar.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: A grave.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: My lady... There will be no obstacles in your way.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm going to Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know that. Why are you telling me this now?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: That's not important. What I'm asking you is... Are you going to stick with me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You could go back to Columbia to continue your business. Before you make your decision, at the very least.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or you could stay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin is right. No one controls fate itself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He will help you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If that is my lady's wish, Old Isin will offer you his assistance, dear child.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You're saying all this now...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I can't decide your future for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if you try to prove to me you're cutting off ties with your past, no matter how extreme your methods, you know from the beginning this is how you've always felt deep inside your heart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm stopping war, I'm stopping the Sargonian civil unrest set off by the legacy of Sarkaz witchcraft, and I'm preventing a large-scale Originium infection—That's my goal, to put it simply.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So you're saying... You've already succeeded?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: And what do you think of all those people who died on your quest?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I get it. I know you saved me. You were really there to save us, and I owe you my life—But they weren't just making preparations for war. That's not their crime—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: —War has already started, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You've seen it, haven't you? You've been in so many battles on your journey. How many people have you killed? And how many of them were out to kill us?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The padishah, the lords ameer. The civil war has started already. If all this come to an end, does it really mean they will gladly set aside their differences and start throwing parties?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You don't understand how the Sargon nobles and the lords ameer work. Their corruption and pride will bog them down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So you'll just... come up with some pointless summary and get up and leave?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I can't, Kal'tsit. Sorry... but I can't.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: What do you want to do?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will find every last one of them...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: From Sargon to Columbia.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: All of them.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Ah... Persistence.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Looks like the child has made up his mind, my lady.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: This is the choice he made, Isin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Old Isin knows. Old Isin respects both of your wishes. Old Isin is very old, after all. Old Isin wants to leave behind a kindling that will spark a new fire...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Will you help me?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: To the best of my ability, my child.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Then, Kal'tsit—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: It's time for us to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.text: Newly awaken from his nightmares, the old man reminisces the glory of the old days as tears well up in his eyes.
The young researcher contemplates to himself. The anger welling up in him manages to suppress even the pain of his infection.
As for Kal'tsit, she merely stays quiet, saying not a word.
The nomad then takes her leave by herself.

attributes.content: My lady... Please do not forget Old Isin's reward.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: In some twenty years, you will return with a gold coin to take away with you this helpless soul.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Mon3tr, it's time to go.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
